# StellarAuth API

## Access Urls
- **Pubnet:** https://api.stellarauth.com/auth
- **Testnet:** https://api-testnet.stellarauth.com/auth

## Get Auth Transaction XDR
**GET** https://api-testnet.stellarauth.com/auth
- ttl `3600`
- account `GC44PZG3GOPLEJK2XD4CD5EMPBDGGD4PEYDRDJYTJO7X2KBJRXGTYLER`
```json
RESPONSE = {
    "account": "GC44PZG3GOPLEJK2XD4CD5EMPBDGGD4PEYDRDJYTJO7X2KBJRXGTYLER",
    "transaction": "",
    "auth": "eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..QLfuCrspgMYXJJTM7aSts1YVMIuxgMSDhaDpPRXGiD4"
}
```

## Verify Auth Transaction Hash
**GET** https://api-testnet.stellarauth.com/auth  
**HEADER** ``Authorization: `Bearer ${RESPONSE.auth}``

`// 404 Not yet verifed`
```json
{
  "type": "https://stellar.org/horizon-errors/not_found",
  "title": "Resource Missing",
  "status": 404,
  "detail": "The resource at the url requested was not found.  This is usually occurs for one of two reasons:  The url requested is not valid, or no data in our database could be found with the parameters provided.",
  "resource": "transaction"
}
```

`// 401 Token or transaction expired`
```json
{
  "message": "Login transaction has expired"
}
```

`// 200 Transaction valid and verified`
```json
{
  "memo": "9OBpqG17P7SteR5v4z9NFvoEdifpbowk54RRk/PFYS4=",
  "id": "be5e8f4f876236d11441d4559a8e01160b5ba907000d7451a95db6fc02f61147",
  "paging_token": "3280964172124160",
  "successful": true,
  "hash": "be5e8f4f876236d11441d4559a8e01160b5ba907000d7451a95db6fc02f61147",
  "ledger": 763909,
  "created_at": "2019-06-10T16:56:33Z",
  "source_account": "GC44PZG3GOPLEJK2XD4CD5EMPBDGGD4PEYDRDJYTJO7X2KBJRXGTYLER",
  "source_account_sequence": "1052309937193037",
  "fee_paid": 100,
  "fee_charged": 100,
  "max_fee": 100,
  "operation_count": 1,
  "envelope_xdr": "",
  "result_xdr": "AAAAAAAAAGQAAAAAAAAAAQAAAAAAAAABAAAAAAAAAAA=",
  "result_meta_xdr": "",
  "fee_meta_xdr": "AAAAAgAAAAMAC6e6AAAAAAAAAAC5x+TbM56yJVq4+CH0jHhGYw+PJgcRpxNLv30oKY3NPAAAABdIdugAAAO9EgAAAEwAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAQAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAEAC6gFAAAAAAAAAAC5x+TbM56yJVq4+CH0jHhGYw+PJgcRpxNLv30oKY3NPAAAABdIduecAAO9EgAAAEwAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAQAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA==",
  "memo_type": "hash",
  "signatures": [
      "marzvo7MUsPzFUX5y07RQcxq0X6pcjQZ1sf0fHzescKH3zcqdco+uozjVEtyXQuQS6qOH2s2Ns6WSiYs9F6HAA==",
      "CQibY7inS2E2NFF98WZFDmUu0GKoFMPigGWCgUK7SK5xhHubJLFEwn6skd0DO/mTSkeUJ/9eonoKLqx58J3qAw=="
  ],
  "valid_after": "2019-06-10T16:56:07Z",
  "valid_before": "2019-06-10T16:57:07Z"
}
```
